price: 63. Hadday (Xaqa ka) jeesadaan, Alle wuu ogsoon yahay kuwa wax fasaadiya.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha ʿalīmun bil-muf'sidīna
